title: Stress Management Techniques
description: Learn and practice effective strategies to manage stress using CBT principles

questions.prompt: Describe a current situation that's causing you stress:
questions.placeholder: Example: Upcoming work presentation, family conflict...

questions.prompt: How does stress typically manifest in your body?
What thoughts go through your mind when you're stressed?
questions.placeholder: Example: I'll never get everything done, I'm going to fail...

questions.prompt: Which unhelpful coping strategy do you most often use when stressed?

Which stress management technique would you like to try first?
Create a specific plan for implementing your chosen technique:
questions.placeholder: Example: I will practice deep breathing for 5 minutes every morning...

questions.prompt: What's a more balanced way to view stressful situations?
options: I can learn from this experience
I can ask for help if needed
